title: Butternut and porcini mushroom risotto
ingredients: ['1 whole butternut squash, about 1kg', 'For the porcini', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '300g fresh porcini mushrooms, sliced', 'salt, to taste', '120ml white wine', 'For the risotto', '1L vegetable stock', '45g butter, divided', '1 spring onion, finely sliced', '350g rice for risotto (Arborio or Carnaroli)', '120ml white wine', '100g grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt, to taste']
